guest_login.title: Guest Login - OutLast Resort
guest_login.description: Welcome to our Outlast Resort's guest login page. Enter your room number and last name to access exclusive amenities and personalized services during your stay. Enjoy a seamless and secure login experience for a memorable stay at our luxurious resort.
guest_login.keywords: hotel resort, guest login, room number, last name, amenities, personalized services

access_code.title: Access Code Login - OutLast Resort
access_code.description: Access our Outlast Resort's amenities by entering your unique access code. Enjoy personalized services during your stay at our luxurious resort.
access_code.keywords: hotel resort, access code login, amenities, personalized services

plan_select.title: Select Your Plan - OutLast Resort
plan_select.description: Choose your desired plan for a delightful stay at our Outlast Resort. Explore exclusive amenities and services tailored to your preferences.
plan_select.keywords: hotel resort, select plan, amenities, personalized services

waiting.title: Waiting - OutLast Resort
waiting.description: Please wait while we process your request. Enjoy a moment of relaxation while we connect you to our premium services at Outlast Resort.
waiting.keywords: hotel resort, waiting page, processing request

connected.title: Connected - OutLast Resort
connected.description: You're now connected to our exclusive amenities and services at Outlast Resort. Relax and indulge in a memorable experience tailored just for you.
connected.keywords: hotel resort, connected, amenities, personalized services

error.title: Error - OutLast Resort
error.description: Oops! Something went wrong. We apologize for the inconvenience. Contact us for assistance at Outlast Resort.
error.keywords: hotel resort, error page, contact us
